item.title: The Coming Low Power Revolution
item.description:
A significant societal shift is underway, centered around a decrease, rather than an increase, in power. This revolution is driven by the need to reduce energy consumption, a stark contrast to the relentless push for productivity fueled by technology. Our reliance on technology for increased productivity has come at a cost: heightened energy consumption. From constantly connected devices to energy-hungry data centers, our appetite for instant information and communication demands a continuous energy supply...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-coming-low-power-revolution/
